title: Bug 118780: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old columns name when select the dataset.
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder and double clicking on the first column name, the original name of the column is displayed below in the expression builder. However, the alias name appears above as row['column1'].
EB: In the expression builder, when selecting the dataset and double clicking the first column name, the expected behavior is for the alias name to be used instead of the original name as per SCR 78193.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the expression builder. 2. Select the dataset. 3. Double click on the first column name.
